preconditions.precondition: Client is connected to the server.

mainSequence.step: Server checks if the user has permission to create post-its.
Server sends the list of boards where the user can write.
Client selects a board to create the post-it.
Client calls the method createPostIt(info) with the necessary information.
Server receives the board title, position, and content of the post-it.
Server creates the post-it in the specified board.
Server sends an acknowledgement code to the client.
